Find the matrix that corresponds to reflecting over the vector $\begin{pmatrix} 3 \\ 2 \end{pmatrix}.$

Final Answer: $\boxed{\begin{pmatrix} \frac{1}{13} & -\frac{12}{13} \\ -\frac{12}{13} & -\frac{1}{13} \end{pmatrix}}$
